snippet: All 10 industry sectors in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose, led by health care, utilities and energy companies.
abstract: Stock market moves higher as investors appear optimistic about outcome of Federal Reserve's policy-making meeting and prospect for interest rates.
lead_paragraph: All 10 industry sectors in the Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index rose, led by health care, utilities and energy companies.

headline.main: Market Closes Higher on Hopes for Fed’s Next Move
headline.print_headline: Market Closes Higher on Hopes for Fed’s Next Move
